articles.title: Top US envoy Rubio to meet Russian officials in Saudi Arabia for Ukraine peace talks - BBC.com
articles.description: US officials say direct talks with Russia - the first such talks since its invasion of Ukraine - will not involve Kyiv's European allies.
articles.content:
US Secretary of State Marco Rubio plans to meet Russian officials in Saudi Arabia in the coming days for talks aimed at ending the war in Ukraine, US officials say.

articles.title: JD Vance’s Greta Thunberg joke at Munich Security Conference sparks anger in Europe; ‘Not acceptable’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: JD Vance took a surprising dig at Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg during a speech at the Munich Security Conference.
articles.content: US Vice President JD Vance took a surprising dig at Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg during a speech at the Munich Security Conference that was mostly critical of Europe's censoring practices.… [+2588 chars]
